heading: Splendid Goa Tour Package

itinerary.day1Overview: Upon reaching Goa, meet our official who will ensure a smooth transfer to your pre-booked hotel and assist with check-in formalities. Spend the day leisurely exploring the surroundings or nearby beaches. In the evening, head to the Santa Monica Jetty under the Atal Setu to board your Sunset cruise on the Mandovi river. Enjoy live music, cultural performances, and scenic views as the sun sets over the horizon. Return to the hotel for an overnight stay in Goa.

itinerary.day2Overview: Wake up in the morning, have a scrumptious breakfast, and proceed for a full day sightseeing of North Goa. Start off by visiting the famous Aguada Fort, followed by Sinquerim Beach, Candolim Beach, Calangute Beach, Baga Beach, Anjuna Beach, and Vagator Beach. Explore the attractions, enjoy water sports, and witness the stunning Vagator Beach. Return to the hotel for an overnight stay in Goa.

itinerary.day3Heading: South Goa Tour OR Excursion to Dudhsagar Waterfalls
itinerary.day3Overview:
Option 1: After breakfast, embark on a tour to South Goa. Visit Shri Manguesh Temple, Old Goa Churches (Bom Jesus Basilica, Se Cathedral), Miramar Beach, and Dona Paula Beach. Enjoy shopping at the Panjim flea market. Return to the hotel for an overnight stay.

Option 2: Alternatively, wake up to a beautiful coastal morning and have breakfast. Proceed for an excursion to Dudhsagar Waterfalls, passing through Mollem Wildlife Sanctuary. Hike to witness the majestic waterfall and visit spice plantations. Return to the hotel for an overnight stay in Goa.

itinerary.day4Overview: After a hearty breakfast, complete the check-out formalities at the hotel. Take along the bundle of joyful memories from the beaches of Goa to cherish for a lifetime. Your trip concludes as you get dropped at the airport/railway station for your onward journey.

overView.heading: Goa Bliss Unveiled: Exploring Coastal Delights
overView.text: Embark on a delightful journey through the sun-kissed state of Goa, where sandy beaches, vibrant nightlife, and rich Portuguese heritage create a perfect blend of relaxation and excitement.

overView.heading: Spiritual Tranquility in Old Goa
overView.text: Immerse yourself in the serene aura of Old Goa. Explore the historic churches, witness the cultural richness, and absorb the tranquil vibes of this spiritual haven, echoing the remnants of Portuguese influence.

overView.heading: Coastal Views in Palolem
overView.text: Discover the pristine coastal views of Palolem. Relax on the sandy shores, experience the lively atmosphere, and embrace the natural beauty of this beach paradise nestled in the heart of Goa's vibrant landscape.

overView.heading: Nature's Charms: Dudhsagar Waterfalls
overView.text: Delve into the natural wonders surrounding Goa. Explore the majestic Dudhsagar Waterfalls, known for their breathtaking cascade amidst lush greenery. Immerse yourself in the refreshing landscapes and revel in the tranquility of this natural marvel.

overView.heading: Culinary Delights of Goa
overView.text: Embark on a culinary journey through Goa. Savor local delicacies like Goan fish curry, Bebinca, and Feni. Explore bustling markets, indulge in authentic Goan cuisine, and relish the diverse flavors of this vibrant coastal state.

overView.heading: Preserving Coastal Heritage
overView.text: Goa is committed to preserving its coastal heritage. From promoting traditional Goan music to conserving historic structures, the state strives to protect its cultural legacy, ensuring an enriching experience for visitors.

overView.heading: Plan Your Goan Retreat
overView.text: Whether seeking beachside tranquility, cultural explorations, or culinary adventures, Goa promises a memorable journey. Plan your retreat in this coastal paradise, where every wave tells a story, and every moment is a celebration of Goa's vibrant charm.
